title: kandanai kANAmal
sahitya:
kandanai kANAmal inda vAzh-venakkEnaDi kanivODu mozhiyADum tOzhiyE


anupallavi

  vandu vandalai shindum shendil vAzh haran maindan enran cintai kavarnda ilai vaDivin vEl tAngum


caraNam    mandamArutam shumanda malar maNam tanai mugharndu maiyal mElOngiDavE mei taLarndEngiyE 
nondu vADiDumennai nOkkiDAnen sheigEn nUrAyiram paridi shErum oLi mEniyan
